Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: வசையிலா வண்பயன் குன்றும் இசையிலாயாக்கை பொறுத்த நிலம்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The ground which supports a body without fame will diminish in its rich produce.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person without fame or a good reputation ('இசை இலா யாக்கை') is shown walking across a patch of land.
Layered_Composition.Midground: The land they are walking on is personified. As their feet touch the ground, the land itself is shown to be recoiling in shame and disgust.
Layered_Composition.Background: Because it is forced to bear the weight of this inglorious person, the land's own 'blameless, rich produce' ('வசையிலா வண் பயன்') is shown to diminish ('குன்றும்'). A field of healthy, golden wheat is shown turning barren and grey wherever the person's shadow falls.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The very earth itself suffers and loses its fertility when it is forced to bear the burden of a person who lives without fame.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The land's fertility being directly destroyed by the presence of the fameless person is the key visual. Their shadow is a literal blight upon the earth. The personified Earth's pained expression reinforces this.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The person is a source of anti-life, casting a shadow that drains the vibrant, golden color from the wheat fields, leaving behind a sterile, grey waste.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot that follows the person as they walk, showing the devastating effect their presence has on the fertility of the land in real-time.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with advanced visual effects to show the life-draining effect.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The person is surrounded by a sickly, life-draining aura.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Dark fantasy, with ecological horror elements.

Cultural_Anchors: The land that bears the body without fame (இசை இலா யாக்கை பொறுத்த நிலம்)
Its rich produce will diminish (வண் பயன் குன்றும்)
